Name: Grand Expectation
Title: Bennett: Grand Expectation
Desc: The best adventure is always yet to be.
Source: Reward for inviting Bennett to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives

Talent.Name: Grand Expectation
Talent.Desc:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1303]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1303] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S13033]</color> once.
When your $[A1303], who has this card equipped, creates an <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C113031]</color>, its DMG Bonus is now always active and will no longer have an HP restriction.
(You must have $[A1303] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)

K1.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>
K1.Desc: After you finish 1 Combat Action, it will be your opponent's turn.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>Playing a card from your Hand with this rule is also a Combat Action rather than a Fast Action</color>.

C113031.Name: Inspiration Field
C113031.Desc: <color=#FFFFFFFF>When your character uses a Skill:</color> If this character has at least 7 HP, deal +2 additional DMG for this instance. After the Skill DMG is finalized, if this character's HP is not greater than 6, heal this character for 2 HP.\n<color=#FFFFFFFF>$[K4]: 2</color>

K4.Name: <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color>
K4.Desc: Each time you reach the end of a Round, <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> -1.\nThis card will be discarded immediately once <color=#FFFFFFFF>Duration (Rounds)</color> runs out.
